name: Space Technician
description:
You are now apparently a Space Technician, who would have thought! Well, your simple task is to repair Shuttles which are being send back Down To Earth. Make sure they are ready for the Flight, and if needed repair it them with the available tools. But don´t sit back and relax, as there is Time Pressure involved, as we say, “Time is Space Cats”. Oh yes, invest some Space Cats in needed Materials and your nourishment, always stay hydrated.

That´s it. Good luck with this task, go on.

 

This Game lacks all the Sounds, I am sorry, didn’t have time for it. 50 Hours of Work in 3 Days, lack of Sleep and some Madness, this is what came out of it, hope you enjoy it at least a bit.

There are 3 different Types of Shuttles, 8 Different Types of Parts, and a everlasting Danger of Fire, which will occur on higher Difficulty Levels.

It´s fairly simple. Press the red Button, use the Tools to repair the Shuttles which are being send back Down To Earth, Invest some Space Cats and enjoy the ever growing chaos as long as you can. Each Round increases the difficulty until Round 10, at which Point Maximum CHAOS will be reached. 

Controlls:

WASD/ Arrows – Move

Left Mouse Button – Interact/Pick Up

Right Mouse Button – Use current Tool

Spacebar - Jump

Escape – Pause/ Quit Game

Cheat Sheet:

Ducktape -

  •  Move the Ducktape against the blank Wall and use it (Click Right Mouse Button)
  • Move the Ducktape against the blank Top Nose and use it (Click Right Mouse Button)
  • Move the Ducktape in the Top with the black Cover, remove the Cover and use it (Click Right Mouse Button)
  • Ducktape can fix almost anything, just slower then other tools

Hammer with blue Cubes - Bash the Hammer against the Wall with blue Cubes (No clicking Required)

Drill with Screws – Move the Drill against the Wall with the bulky white Cover, remove the cover and use it (Hold Right Mouse Button)

Fuel canister – Move the Fuel canister against the Wall with the small red Cover, remove the cover and use it (Hold Right Mouse Button)

Soldering iron with Wires – Move the Soldering Iron against the Wall with the black tall Cover, remove the cover and use it (Hold Right Mouse Button)

Fire Extinguisher – Move in near the Fire and use it (Hold Right Mouse Button)

Door with the Valve – Rotate the Valve to close it (Hold Right Mouse Button and Drag it)

Less Water – Slower Movement

Less Food – Slower Handling and Holding of Objects

Using wrong Tools on Wrong Parts of the Shuttle will cause more Damage
